name: Houseplants and Happiness
description:
Fill your home with plants that bring you happiness. Select which plants to buy and place them on your shelves and watch them grow! Growing takes time, but if you're patient, eventually your garden will be full of plants.

We are also working on adding other decorations you can add, as well as creating new rooms to decorate and a few other features! :D

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2019
